text: Bonnœuvre was a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. On 1 January 2018, it was merged into the new commune of Vallons-de-l'Erdre.Arrêté préfectoral 29 December 2017 == References == Category:Former communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Bonnœuvre
